The prince bowed to signify his respect and gratitude. 
"I often think," she continued after a short pause, drawing nearer to the prince and smil- ing amiably at him as if to show that political and social topics were ended and the time had come for intimate conversation "I often think how unfairly sometimes the joys of life are dis- tributed.
